Renderer¶

class mnemosyne.libmnemosyne.renderer.Renderer(name='', description='')¶
render_card_fields(card, fields)¶
Renders a sequence of fields from a card, e.g. by generating html from them. ‘fields’ is typically either fact_view.q_fields or fact_view.a_fields.
